business_definition: Group item containing all card-related information for a credit or debit card entity (Record length 150 bytes)
16-character card number uniquely identifying the payment card
11-digit account identifier linking the card to a customer account
3-digit Card Verification Value code used for security validation
Cardholder name as embossed on the physical card, up to 50 characters
Single character flag indicating whether the card is currently active or inactive
Reserved placeholder field used for data structure alignment, padding, or holding constant values
